title: LF DUO (ADC PREFERRED)
body: Silver 2 Support God looking for an ADC to climb with. We would be unstoppable!!! Add me in game or leave a comment!

replies.body: Sweet as dude. Here we come Challenger.
PM me on LoL and we'll chat, ign Jarthur121
hey i mostly main mid but i would still love to duo with you we could synergise ganks and ambushes, up to you though i main tf btw my IGN: Locky add me if you are interested
